short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI assisted reading in your browser. Free and open source.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
1. Dictionary
2. Translation
3. Ask AI about the page and take actions

Productivity Tips:
1. Selection for search: Select text on the page and click on the extension icon.
2. Ask AI: Type your query in the search box and press "Shift + Enter".


Project: https://github.com/zmzhang8/reading_ai
Privacy: Read our three-line privacy policy https://github.com/zmzhang8/reading_ai/blob/main/privacy.md
